data.actual_result: No alert is shown in settings, both actions occur when using CTRL+, (mute and open settings)
data.expected_result: Should give the "keybinding conflicts" alert (as happens if you try to bind CTRL+K) and override the default action (opening settings).
data.short_description: CTRL+, shortcut does not conflict in keybindings settings
data.steps_to_repro: - in settings create a new keybinding - set the action to toggle mute and the keybind to CTRL+, - exit settings and press CTRL+,
